entry.title: Spark Backend for Ibis: Seamless Transition Between Pandas and Spark
entry.summary:
Description

Ibis a library that provides unified pandas-like API on top of both single-node local execution (e.g. pandas) and multi-node remote execution (e.g. BigQuery, Impala). In this talk, we will introduce a new backend for executing Ibis programs on Spark and show how you can write analytics that run on both Spark and pandas.

entry.title: Improving Pandas and PySpark performance and interoperability with Apache Arrow
entry.summary:
Description

Apache Spark has become a popular and successful way for Python programming to parallelize and scale up data processing. However, it's not well integrated with popular Python tools such as Pandas, and often result in poor performance when using Pandas with PySpark. In this talk, we will demonstrate how we improve PySpark performance with Apache Arrow.
